alert.note: Alert for Coastal Broward County; Coastal Collier County; Coastal Miami Dade County; Coastal Palm Beach County; Far South Miami-Dade County; Inland Broward County; Inland Miami-Dade County; Mainland Monroe; Metro Broward County; Metropolitan Miami Dade (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued March 12 at 3:22PM EST until March 12 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Miami
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM EST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...West winds 20 to 25 mph with gusts up to 40 mph expected. * WHERE...Inland Miami-Dade, Metro Broward, Mainland Monroe, Metro Miami-Dade, Inland Broward, Coastal Collier, Coastal Palm Beach, Coastal Broward, Coastal Miami-Dade and Far South Miami- Dade Counties. * WHEN...Until 7 PM EST this evening. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
